wikipedia_page.main: Arthur William Sibbald Paterson  (28 February 1878 – 13 November 1937) was a British army officer who played first-class cricket for Somerset in two matches in the 1903 season.He was born at Weston-super-Mare, Somerset and died at Burnham-on-Sea, also in Somerset.
